Title: Past is Prologue
Plot: Kyle returns to find Riley and the family he abandoned anything but welcoming. Meanwhile, Riley is entrusted with the reins of The Rub of Sugar Land after Georgia is tipped off that authorities have her on their radar. This added new authority, however, puts Riley's secret life in jeopardy of being exposed.
GuestStars: Betty White, Paul Dooley, Elisabeth Roehm, Greg Grunberg, Trevor St. John
